trans-unit.target: TEXT_REGGYR3RADIATA_00400_LEAPINGDOE_000_000<tab>I don't know you. Why have you come to Radiata?
TEXT_REGGYR3RADIATA_00400_LEAPINGDOE_000_010<tab>Tell you about myself...? You really are a stranger here, aren't you. Too much talk can get a person killed.

TEXT_REGGYR3RADIATA_00400_LEAPINGDOE_000_011<tab>My father talked too much once─complained about his job. A “friend” reported him to the authorities, and then the soldiers came to take him away as a “suspected insurgent.” I never saw him again.

TEXT_REGGYR3RADIATA_00400_LEAPINGDOE_000_012<tab>And then there was my little brother. When a group of patriots heard he was a laborer for the Empire, they strung him up from a tree. So, no─you don't talk about yourself around here.
TEXT_REGGYR3RADIATA_00400_LEAPINGDOE_000_013<tab>There's not much to tell. I'm Leaping Doe─I live here.

TEXT_REGGYR3RADIATA_00400_LEAPINGDOE_000_014<tab>I could probably pack up and move somewhere else now that the imperials are gone, but I guess I've just been here too long. I've a mind to stay a while anyway, just in case my father ever comes back...
TEXT_REGGYR3RADIATA_00400_LEAPINGDOE_000_015<tab>Now that we don't need to live in fear every day, Radiata's not such a bad place to be.
TEXT_REGGYR3RADIATA_00400_LEAPINGDOE_000_020<tab>Radiata? Well, this village is home to those who labor at Castrum Abania or Specula Imperatoris. Think of it as an imperial slave pen.

TEXT_REGGYR3RADIATA_00400_LEAPINGDOE_000_021<tab>It certainly wasn't called “Radiata” by the folk who live here. It had a different name once, but you'll not hear anyone say it out loud. That earns you a visit from the correction officers.
TEXT_REGGYR3RADIATA_00400_LEAPINGDOE_000_022<tab>You tell other villagers you're from Radiata, though, and it'll get you spit on. To everyone else, we're the Empire's “whipped curs.”
TEXT_REGGYR3RADIATA_00400_LEAPINGDOE_000_023<tab>We lose either way. If we're to be treated like dogs for where we were born, then we've no choice but to live like one...
TEXT_REGGYR3RADIATA_00400_LEAPINGDOE_000_024<tab>This village is home to those who were forced to labor at Castrum Abania or Specula Imperatoris. That's all changed now, of course.

TEXT_REGGYR3RADIATA_00400_LEAPINGDOE_000_025<tab>The imperials have lost any hold they had here, aside from the name they gave the place. It did have another, once upon a time, but I guess everyone is too used to “Radiata” to bother switching it back.

TEXT_REGGYR3RADIATA_00400_LEAPINGDOE_000_026<tab>Hells, I don't think even a single person has left the place. Perhaps the idea of freedom hasn't sunk in yet─gotta remember what it's like to stretch your wings before you can fly away.
